Description: pywcsgrid2Homepage URL: http://leejjoon.github.com/pywcsgrid2/Pywcsgrid2 is a python module to be used with matplotlib for displaying astronomical FITS images. It provides a custom Axes class (derived from mpl’s original Axes class) suitable for displaying FITS images. Its main functionality is to draw ticks, ticklabels, and grids in an appropriate sky coordinates.
Provides a custom Matplotlib Axes class based on mpl_toolkits.axis artist module
Easy integration with mpl_toolkits.axes_grid1 module
For a sampling, see the gallery
